Solution.statement: Solution: AC-3 M1Sn1: log of connection request
Solution: AC-3 M1Sn2: log of auth decision
Solution: AC-3 M2Sn2: test cases of apply authorization
Solution: AC-3 M2Sn3: log of send data

MainGoal.control_action: enforces approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources in accordance with applicable access control policies
MainGoal.statement: Goal: AC-3 AC-3 Main Main: information system enforces approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources in accordance with applicable access control policies; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(authorizationApproval),val(accessControlPolicy)]; aw = 1

MainGoal.control_action: enable authorized users to determine whether access authorizations assigned to a sharing partner match the information’s access and use restrictions
MainGoal.statement: Goal: AC-21 AC-21 Main Main: organization enable authorized users to determine whether access authorizations assigned to a sharing partner match the information’s access and use restrictions; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(authorizationDecision)]; aw = 1

MainGoal.control_action: establish configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of wireless acces
MainGoal.statement: Goal: AC-18 AC-18 Main Main: organization establish configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of wireless acces; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(usageRestrictions ),sat(usageRestrictions),val(connectionRequirement),sat(connectionRequirement),val(implementationGuidance), sat(implementationGuidance)]; aw = 1

ReqGoal.functional_requirement: check conncetion request and enforce authorization approval
ReqGoal.statement: Goal: AC-3 Req1: enforceAuthorization maintains check conncetion request and enforce authorization approval; aw = 1

ModuleGoal.statement: Module: AC-3 M1 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of getAuthorization; aw = 1
Module: AC-3 M2 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of applyAuthorization; aw = 1

OpGoal.statement: Goal: AC-3 M1 G1: Variables = Conn; Condition = get request; aw = 1
Goal: AC-3 M1 G2: Variables = AuthConn; Condition = set true for authorized connection; aw = 1
Goal: AC-3 M2 G1: Variables = AuthConn; Condition = set true for authorized connection; aw = 1
Goal: AC-3 M2 G2: Variables = send; Condition = send data; aw = 1

Strategy.statement: Strategy: AC-3 S1: Argument over enforceAuthorization
Strategy: AC-3 M1S1: Argument over getAuthorization
Strategy: AC-3 M2S1: Argument over applyAuthorization
